New Records: Bailey Falter carried a no-hitter into the seventh inning
Jared Triolo hit his eighth home run of the season
Key Match Events: Pittsburgh Pirates scored twice in the first inning
Jared Triolo extended the lead with a home run
Post-Match Reflections: Pittsburgh Pirates manager Derek Shelton highlighted the team's improvement
Miami Marlins manager Skip Schumaker praised the team's effort
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Marlins were swept in the season series
John McMillon was injured during the game
